mapper.insert: insert into board (userid, subject, content, hit, regtime) values (#{userid}, #{subject}, #{content}, 0, now())
mapper.select: select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, regtime from board where articleno = #{articleno}
select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, regtime from board where subject like '%${subject}%'
select articleno, userid, subject, content, hit, regtime from board where userid = #{userid}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where articleno = #{articleno}
mapper.insert: insert into comment (userid, articleno, content, regtime) values (#{userid}, #{articleno}, #{content}, now())
